translations: v.（曲线或面）与（另一曲线或面）互成密切；亲吻

phrs.translation: 接触, 亲吻, 有共通点

sentences.sentence: Throught numerous of GuangZhou Export Machindise Fair experience, can fluent osculate and negotiate business with foreign clients;
sentences.translation: 带着多次的广交会经验，能流利的和外商沟通，洽谈；

sentences.sentence: In this big world, we osculate with so many different kinds of people. Because of this everybody knows that there are lots of emotions engendered in our life.
sentences.translation: 在广袤的世界，独一无二的我们有着很多共通之处，这是每个人都知道的，也正因为这样，人们在生活中产生了各种各样的情感。
